Pattern • Fingerprint • Face
PIN • Fingerprint • Face
com.google.android.settings.future.biometrics.faceenroll
Use Fingerprint Unlock
Allow Face Unlock
On the next screen, rotate your head to capture all angles of your face
On the next screen, hold your phone at eye level
Looks good!
Setup for limited vision or head motion
When using Face Unlock, your head may need to be more directly in front of your phone.
Require eyes open
Using your child’s face to unlock their phone may be less secure than a strong pattern or PIN.
You and your child can delete their face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the phone until they’re deleted.\n\nLearn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock.
You and your child are in control
You can delete your face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the phone until you delete them.\n\nLearn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock.
You’re in control

Face Unlock creates a unique model of your child’s face to verify it’s them. To create this face model during setup, your child will take images of their face from different angles.\n\nWhen they use Face Unlock, images are used to update their face model. Images used to create their face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on the phone and never leaves the phone. All processing occurs securely on the phone.

Face Unlock creates a unique model of your face to verify it’s you. To create this face model during setup, you will take images of your face from different angles.\n\nWhen you use Face Unlock, images are used to update your face model. Images used to create your face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on your phone and never leaves the phone. All processing occurs securely on your phone.
How it works
Face Unlock can require your child’s eyes to be open to unlock the phone or verify it’s them. You and your child can turn this option on at any time in Settings.
If your child normally wears eyeglasses, they can wear them during setup.
Using your child’s face to unlock their phone may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password

Looking at the phone can unlock it even when they don’t intend to. Their phone can also be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like them, like an identical sibling, or if someone holds it up to their face.
Face Unlock can require your eyes to be open to unlock the phone or verify it’s you. You can turn this option on at any time in Settings.
Using your face to unlock your phone may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password

Looking at the phone can unlock it even when you don’t intend to. Your phone can also be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling, or if someone holds it up to your face.
Keep in mind
How to set up Face Unlock
Now you can pick up your phone and use your face to unlock it

Delete your current face model to set up Face Unlock again.

Your face model will be permanently and securely deleted.

After deletion, you will need your PIN, pattern, or password to unlock your phone.

Delete your current face model to set up Face Unlock again.

Your face model will be permanently and securely deleted.

After deletion, you will need your fingerprint, PIN, pattern, or password to unlock your phone.
If you normally wear eyeglasses, you can wear them during setup.
Use your face to unlock your phone

Use your face to unlock your phone.

Keep in mind:
You can only have one face set up at a time. To add another face, delete the current one.

Looking at the phone can unlock it when you don’t intend to.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone else if it’s held up to your face.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling.

Use your face to unlock your phone.

Keep in mind:
You can only have one face set up at a time. To add another face, delete the current one.

Looking at the phone can unlock it when you don’t intend to.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone else if it’s held up to your face, even if your eyes are closed.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling.
To unlock the phone, your eyes must be open. For best results, take off sunglasses when unlocking the phone.
